item.title: Why types are elegant
item.description: I’ve been working with a Go(for work) and Rust(for fun) lately. I got pulled into the two languages for different reasons (easy concurrency and memory safety respectively) and ended up staying for a totally different reason altogether. Their type systems. Composition instead of inheritance. It feels elegant, right and very readable. I’m going to talk about something that happened today when I was super thankful for composition and typing itself.
